feed.title: Category: quote | From the desk of Machiko Yasuda

entry.title: Overheard, the greatest hits
entry.content:
A collection of quotes I’ve heard lately and I have now have been playing in my mind, on endless repeat:

“Be resilient to failure. It’s like wearing a bulletproof vest.” “Shit is easier. I make it myself.” “Keep learning fun â€” you’ll have more dopamine in your system and your memory will skyrocket.” “Write, even if you don’t publish. You will learn from it” On side projects for learning: “It doesn’t matter if someone else did it.” “Everyone here is free to be wrong.” “Trying fails, awareness cures.” “Don’t warehouse knowledge.” “If design is the how, art direction is the why, front-end is the what and back-end is the factory. Digital is the norm”
